GO GeneOntology



= Motivation =



Download the gene inheriting a given GO identifier using the QuickGO API.




= Solution =

Call the QuickGO API to get the protein in the domain of a given GO[http://www.geneontology.org/] ID.


==References==
Knime4Bio[https://code.google.com/p/knime4bio/].  *Author:*  Pierre Lindenbaum[http://plindenbaum.blogspot.com] PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes[http://www.umr915.univ-nantes.fr/].  *Reference* :  _manuscript in preparation_ . Please, report any problem here[https://code.google.com/p/knime4bio/issues/list].


= Parameters =


  * *Term* : The GO ID. e.g:  *GO:0003015* 
  * *Taxon-ID* : NCBI taxon ID . Human=9606

= Output =


  * *QuickGO* : QuickGO result
